item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: Data Distribution How much failure rate of erasure code transmission are we expecting. Basically, what are the EC coding parameters that we expect to be sending such that we have some failure rate of transmission?

item.title: Logos BFT Overview
item.description: Logos BFT is a consensus candidate for the Logos Network that utilizes Fountain Codes and a committees tree structure to optimize message propagation in the presence of a large number of nodes, while maintaining high througput and fast finality.
